mdx.rawBody:
---
Song: manasukkuLLa
Film: mallu vEtti mainar
---
Notes: s r2 g3 m1 p d2 n2 S

manasukkuLLa nAyana chaTHam   nAn kEttEn
p d n  d  p  m g r  r  rgmgrs gmr gmp p

kanavukuLLa mAlaya katti     nAn pOttEn
p S n d  p  m g r  r  rgmgrs gmr gmp p

ponnAram      nee pOda       ohh ohh   ho ho ho
dnp dnSS ndp  dnp dnSRS ndp  pdn dpmgr pr pr p

Stanza 1:
sariga vEtti sandhanathil minnuriyE minnuriyE
p S S  S  S  n  S  n Sp   p  dmp pd pd Snd pS

podava kattum poNNu kitta mAttuniyE mAttuniyE
p S S  S  S   n  S  n  dp pd m p pd pd n d p

thAli oNNu pOtta pinnE     enga kadha unga kitta
pn n  n n  nS R  S  n dnpd mpd  d d   dnRS n  d

vAzhugira vAzhkkaiyellam    seedhanama thandhu vittEn
pn n n n  nS  MR  S  n dnpd mp d  d d  dn  RS  n  d

oNNOda       oNNanOm      ohh ohh   ho ho ho
dnpdnSS ndp  dnpdnSRS ndp pdn dpmgr pr pr p

Stanza 2: (notes similar to Stanza 1)
munnamoru kAlathila ungappanumdhan sOkALi
mambattiya kaiyil edhuthu maNNai nambum pAtALi
manasu mattum vachuputta mALigayum kitta varum
mALigayil nAmirundha oorum kaiya katta varum
nAndhAne unn rAsa ohh ohh oh oh oh
